p: This work was supported by the ZiBRA2 project supported by the Brazilian Ministry of Health (SVS- MS) and the Pan American Organization (OPAS) and founded by Decit/SCTIE/MoH and CNPq (440685/2016-8 and 440856/2016-7); by CAPES (88887.130716/2016-00, 88881.130825/2016-00 and 88887.130823/2016-00); by EU’s Horizon 2020 Programme through ZIKAlliance (PRES-005-FEX-17-4-2-33). The Virology and Experimental Therapy Laboratory (LaVite) at Aggeu Magalhães Institute (IAM) FIOCRUZ-PE is supported by Fundação de Amparo à Ciência e Tecnologia do Estado de Pernambuco (FACEPE) [grant number APQ-0078-2.02/16].
